name: centiliter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of measurement of liquid equal to 0.01 of a liter
Examples
The scale on this measuring jug shows milliliters rather than centiliters.If you want to convert liters to centiliters, you multiply by 100.The insulin is supplied from the manufacturer in 10-centiliter bottles.The abbreviation 'cl' stands for centiliters.Why doesn't the recipe just say 2 liters, instead of 200 centiliters?
